name: Pixel Invaders (Andrew Hoyer)
description:
Thank you for playing Pixel Invaders! This game was created for the LOWREZJAM 2021 game jam, with the restriction that the game must use only 64x64 pixels. I have been making shoot 'em ups and thought it would be fun to make one on a small scale.

Game is simple: Blast your way through waves of enemies, and get the highest score you can.

CONTROLS

Left/Right: A/D or left and right arrow keys

Fire: X, Space, or period (.). Save your fingers and keys by holding down for rapid fire.

Easy, Normal, and Hard mode available in the menu.

CREDITS

Game Engine

PixelBox (https://pixwlk.itch.io/pixelbox). Seriously, check this out if you want something to do quick game jams and/or prototypes.

Artwork

Player ship and enemies are assets by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux), scaled down to low pixel sizes!

Music

Ouroboros by Kevin MacLeod
